legacy:anathema.NAME: Anathema
legacy:anathema.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL [#eeee00]Permanently[] increase damage by !M! . NL [#ff0000]Lose[] 1 Max Hp.

legacy:frenzied_berserker.DESCRIPTION: Double your strength. NL Enter Wrath.
legacy:frenzied_berserker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple your strength. NL Enter Wrath.

legacy:padded_armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  NL Gain !M! Temporary Dexterity.

legacy:steel_shield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Temporary HP.

legacy:whirling_dervish.NAME: Whirling Dervish
legacy:whirling_dervish.DESCRIPTION: Double the amount of legacy:Flurry stacks you generate. NL Draw a card every time you play !M! attacks in a turn.
